mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.FREE_CO_NO, A.FREE_NO, A.COMM_CONTENT,A.COMM_CREATE_DATE, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.GROUP_ORDER, A.USER_NO , A.ID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH) AS ROW_NUM, F.FREE_CO_NO, F.FREE_NO, F.COMM_CONTENT, F.COMM_CREATE_DATE, F.STATE, F.DEPTH, F.GROUP_NO, F.GROUP_ORDER, F.USER_NO, U.ID, U.NICKNAME, U.GENDER FROM FREE_COMMENT F INNER JOIN USERS U ON F.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) A WHERE FREE_NO = #{freeNo}
